name: Toot-al darkness
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51 - "Every 10 seconds"

It's said that a creature lurks these woods. Few live to tell the tale of their encounters, but those who have mentioned finding some sort of ritualistic items. Collecting enough of them was the key to their survival.

Don't  make a sound, stay out of sight... you never know where it lurks at night. Oh, and don't be too nervous - you've got this!

Controls

WASD - Movement

RMB - Hold breath

E - Interact

F - Toggle flashlight

Tab - See objective
